metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7827 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Botan before 1.10.13 and 1.11.x before 1.11.22 make it easier for remote attackers to conduct million-message attacks by measuring time differences, related to decoding of PKCS#1 padding.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7827` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbotan-1.10-1 - 1.10.13-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: seth-arnold> "Fixed in 1.11.22. Affected all previous versions."

criterions.comment: botan1.10 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.13-1').
